metadata.filename: 义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级下册_21afd6d3
metadata.source: /Users/LeoQin/Documents/GitHub/PDFconvertor/flattened_pdfs/义务教育教科书·英语（三年级起点）四年级下册_21afd6d3.pdf

content: 同学们，欢迎你们来到英语学习课堂！ 还记得上个学期学习的知识吗？哪些是你特别感兴趣的？ 哪些是你感觉有些难度的？回顾一下，发现自己学习中存在的问题，并加以改进，这样才会不断进步。 在本册课本中，同学们将学习用英语表达四季、自然现象、 星期、国家等，并将继续通过生动有趣的小故事，巩固初级的听、说、读、写技能。 在本册课本中，同学们还将学习用英语表达“正在做什么事情”。同学们可不要怕难哦，在老师的指导下，逐步理解，反复练习，你就可以很好地掌握和表达了。 英语是一种广泛使用的国际语言，我们国家的发展需要很多能熟练使用英语的人才，而语言又是和文化密切相关的。为了帮助同学们更好地掌握英语，理解外国文化，了解中外文化差异， 我们将在课本中逐渐介绍一些相关的知识，如本册课本中介绍了中国和主要英语国家的名称和国旗。希望同学们在中外文化的对比学习中，能增强祖国意识，开拓国际视野，形成初步的跨文化交际意识和能力。 请记住，坚持听说，大胆玩演，积极读写。让我们一起努力吧！ 你们的大朋友：小学《英语》教材编写组

content: 65 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World St. Patrick’s Day is a holiday in the U K. People wear green clothes on that day. Who is St. (Saint) Patrick? St. Patrick is a wise man and good teacher. At that time, people in the country are having a hard time . The farmers cannot grow more food . People are hungry. So, they ask St. Patrick for help. He shows them clover and how clover can make their land better . The farmers learn from his teaching. Their land gets better. They can have more food. The people are very happy. St. Patrick’s Day Activity The farmers learn from St. Patrick. clover Paste a clover leaf here. Look at the picture of the clover. Can you find a clover leaf? a hard time grow food clover better Guess, Chec k and Learn This is a clover. It can make your land better. Thank you! clover

content: 66 Let’s Read More Stories Stories from from Around Around the the World World Qinmou is a little golden monkey . He lives with his father and mother on a mountain in Sichuan. One day, a big truck and lots of men come to the mountain. They cut down all the trees. The golden monkeys have no home to live in. There are no more trees on the mountain. Qinmou cannot find his father and mother. He cannot find his friends. Winter comes and Qinmou cannot find things to eat. There are no more fruit and flowers. So Qinmou is very hungry. On one cold morning, Qinmou dies . How can we help the golden monkeys? Golden Monkeys of Sichuan Activity golden monkey truck cut down fruit die Guess, Chec k and Learn Answer “Y” (yes) or “N” (no). Qinmou, I love you! 1. This is a happy story. ( ) 2. Monkeys live in trees. ( ) 3. Some people cut down trees on the mountain. ( ) 4. Golden monkeys eat fruit and flowers. ( ) Help! truck The man cuts down
